content: The gravitate project (https://www.gravitatehealth.eu/ ) has started on its initial profiling of eletronic product information. IG is found here: http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7-eu/gravitate-health/artifacts.html - and we're always looking for input. If you have any please ping us here or throw an issue here: https://github.com/hl7-eu/gravitate-health
